alert.note: Alert for Kidder; La Moure (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 8:55PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Kidder and La Moure Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Tuesday to Midnight CST Tuesday Night. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow with areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility making travel hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous wind chills could return Tuesday night, and likely remain through the end of the week.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
